definition: a serious examination and judgment of something
details:
noun
- a serious examination and judgment of something
= example: a serious examination and judgment of something
= synonyms: critique
- a written evaluation of a work of literature
= synonyms: literary criticism
- disapproval expressed by pointing out faults or shortcomings
= example: disapproval expressed by pointing out faults or shortcomings
= synonyms: unfavorable judgment
